Title: Upstream issues force unplanned outage at Norway’s Nyhamna gas plant
Description: Norway's 79.8 million m3 per day Nyhamna processing plant exporting natural gas to Europe has shut down for unplanned maintenance, pushing European futures prices to their highest level so far this year.
Author: JS

Title: PTT seeks four July to August LNG cargoes
Description: Thailand’s state-owned PTT is seeking four LNG cargoes for delivery in July to August through a tender that closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: First Gen seeks long-term LNG supply deals
Description: Philippines’ utility First Gen is in talks to secure supplies for delivery of LNG to its 5 mtpa Batangas LNG terminal in Luzon.
Author: JS

Title: Japan’s Jera in discussions with Qatar for long-term LNG supplies
Description: Japan’s largest utility Jera is in discussions with Qatar for long-term LNG supplies, after deciding not to renew contracts totalling over 5 mtpa of LNG with state-owned QatarEnergy that expired in 2021.
Author: CK
